Scene1_0.title: Prologue
Scene1_0.speaker: You
Scene1_0.dialogue_line: This is where the story starts.

Scene1_1.title: Prologue
Scene1_1.speaker: You
Scene1_1.dialogue_line: I wonder what would have happened if i did not decide to do this. If i just had stayed home.

Scene1_2.title: Prologue
Scene1_2.speaker: You
Scene1_2.dialogue_line: But I guess... i'm not in a position to wonder anymore.
